title: Travertine quarries that built ancient Rome are carving rock for a new generation of temples
description: One of the latest projects is a new travertine façade for the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints temple in New York City.

title: Frozen in time Yorkshire village with ancient bridges and babbling brook
description: Just six miles from Sheffield, the boasts beautiful bridges over a babbling brook, scenic Peak District walks, historic pubs and a fascinating yet tragic flood history dating back to 1864
